name: Bad Snowmen
description:
Two angry snowmen engage in a snowball fight. As they jump and toss only one of them will emerge victorious, with their hat and carrot nose intact.

Instructions

Navigate menus with SPACE or LEFT MOUSE BUTTON.

- Tap to change option

- Hold until snowball rotates and release to select option

Gameplay

On ground press action button to jump. Hold and release to jump higher.

In the air press action button to toss a snowball. Hold and release to toss it harder.

The goal of the game is to hit your opponent's nose and hat.

Multiplayer

In multiplayer the second player controls the right snowman using ENTER or RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON.

Credits

Music by Music_For_Videos from Pixabay

Font by https://www.dafont.com/cute-notes.font 

Source code

Game is made in Godot. Source code is freely available on GitHub
